problem.markdown:
For each farming practice or objective listed below, indicate whether it is associated with organic farming, commercial/conventional farming, or both.
>>Use of mechanization<< [[organic, commercial/conventional,(both)]]
>>Use of synthetic pesticides and fertilizers<< [[organic, (commercial/conventional),both]]
>>Reliance on fossil fuels<< [[organic, commercial/conventional,(both)]]
>>Enhances biodiversity and soil quality<< [[(organic), commercial/conventional,both]]
[explanation] Organic and commercial/conventional farming both use mechanization and fossil fuels. Organic farming does not use synthetic pesticides and fertilizers. Organic farming does enhance biodiversity and improves soil quality. [explanation]
